column1: MIDAS src_id 2997 BROWNHILLS: COMBE HOUSE Start 1934 end 1967

NGR is based on the relationships to the station and church. Altitudes match. Discrepancy in the distances means NGR could be +/- 200m. Gauge moved to Coombe House in 1948 where the UDC offices were based, the observer was named as the Borough Surveyor. The move was about 700m, a note on the record suggests that the move was between 0.25 and 0.5 miles. New gauge installed initially in the old position but given a different station number, i.e. suffix added.
